name: rhodium
description: A TypeScript `Promise` wrapper that adds syntax sugar.
author: iluha168

scripts.test: NO_COLOR=1 deno check test 2>/dev/null && NO_COLOR=1 deno test --parallel --coverage 2>/dev/null | tail -n1 | cut -d'|' -f4 | grep -q 100.0
scripts.check: npm run fmt:check && deno lint && npm run test && deno publish --allow-dirty --dry-run
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && esbuild --bundle --minify --format=esm --platform=node --target=node24 src/mod.mts --outfile=dist/mod.mjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run check && npm run build
